channel.title: Breaking – Soompi
channel.description: The longest-running K-Pop site, since 1998, covering K-Pop news, music, fashion, videos, photos and Kdramas. Anything and everything K-Pop.

item.description:

BTS has made their return on “The Ellen DeGeneres Show.” On May 25, the popular boy group performed their title track “Fake Love” from their latest album “Love Yourself: Tear,” and also got a chance to talk with Ellen on the show. item.title: BTS Surpasses 90 Million Views For “Fake Love” MV With New Record
item.dc:creator: notclaira
item.description:
BTS’s “Fake Love” music video has achieved another milestone! The “Fake Love” MV surpassed 90 million views on YouTube at approximately 8:15 a.m. KST on May 25. This is about six days and 14 hours since its release on May 18 at 6 p.m. KST. The previous record time for a K-pop group music video to achieve 90 […]

item.title: BTS Breaks Record With 1 Million Albums Sold In 1st Week
item.dc:creator: ilmare42
item.description:
BTS has already sold 1 million copies of their new album “Love Yourself: Tear”! The group’s latest album came out on May 18, and features the title track “Fake Love.” “Love Yourself: Tear” reached 1 million copies sold according to Hanteo’s sales tally on the afternoon of May 24. This is the highest number of albums recorded on […]

The post BTS Breaks Record With 1 Million Albums Sold In 1st Week appeared first on Soompi.

BTS’s Jimin has responded to the recent death threats made against him. item.title: TWICE Tops Billboard Japan’s Hot 100 Chart + Several BTS Tracks Take Impressive Rankings
item.dc:creator: DY_Kim
item.description:
TWICE and BTS have shown impressive results on Billboard Japan’s weekly chart! Earlier in the week, it was revealed that “Wake Me Up” topped Oricon’s weekly singles chart and became the first foreign artist in history to surpass 200,000 sales with three consecutive releases. In the newest Hot 100 announced by Billboard Japan, TWICE’s third […]

item.title: BTS’s New Album + Loco And MAMAMOO’s Hwasa’s Duet Top Weekly Gaon Charts
item.dc:creator: notclaira
item.description:
Gaon has revealed its chart rankings for the week of May 13 to May 19. Loco and MAMAMOO’s Hwasa’s “Don’t” took the No. 1 spot on the overall digital chart and the streaming chart, making this its fourth consecutive week at the top of both charts. TWICE’s “What Is Love” came in at No. 5 on both charts as […]
